created_by: Roberto Rodriguez @Cyb3rWard0g, Open Threat Research (OTR), wagga
name: T1021 DCOM InternetExplorer.Application Iertutil DLL Hijack
description: Detects a threat actor creating a file named `iertutil.dll` in the `C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer\` directory over the network and loading it for a DCOM InternetExplorer DLL Hijack scenario.
query: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Sysmon\/Operational AND ((event.code:11 AND process.executable:/[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]/ AND file.path:/.*\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt]\ [Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\\[Ii][Ee][Rr][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/) OR (event.code:7 AND process.executable:/.*\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt]\ [Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\\[Ii][Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND file.path:/.*\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt]\ [Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\\[Ii][Ee][Rr][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Sysmon\/Operational AND ((event.code:11 AND process.executable:System AND file.path:*\\Internet\ Explorer\\iertutil.dll) OR (event.code:7 AND process.executable:*\\Internet\ Explorer\\iexplore.exe AND file.path:*\\Internet\ Explorer\\iertutil.dll)))`
